programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to "irreconcilable differences". For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesnt like change; its like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamputs perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously thats the real enemy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: While performing a school play, Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally headbutts her and cracks open her shell. Pennys father is determined for Penny to keep it hidden but Gumball encourages her to show the world who, or what, she really is.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Dad has to make the kids on time for their first day back at school. But hes overslept and now he cant find Gumball, Darwin or Anais anywhere. He sets about retracing his steps from the day before, to work out where they might be. When he finally figures out where they are, its a race against time to rescue them and prove to himself - and Mum - that hes not a bad father.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party, Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. When Gumball and Darwin decide to think outside the box, their unusual gift is a big surprise, but not a good one.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin wants to get back a love letter he wrote to Carrie before she sees it.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. / Nicole remembers the day she first met Richard, and the different choices she could have made.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When a typically stressful Watterson family dinner pushes her to the edge of her sanity, Nicole starts reminiscing about the time she met Richard. Might her life have been better if shed never stopped to talk to her future husband and taken a different path instead?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When the Wattersons internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that hes "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Dad gives Larrys Hairdressers a bad review for saying hes bald, he gets offered a free haircut. This inspires Gumball and Darwin to go on a reviewing-spree across town, forcing Larry to give them stuff with the threat of a bad review. Just because the customer is always right doesnt mean that what theyre doing isnt wrong.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: No matter what Gumball does, Carmen thinks she knows better. Gumball attempts to gain the moral high ground but fails... The only option left is to bring Carmen down to his level. 15 mins, U (2011) (CC)

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball must face his demons and overcome an embarrassing incident from his past if he wants to finally summit the dreaded rock-climbing wall in gym class.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: While searching the attic for items to put in their yard sale, Gumball and Darwin stumble upon a load of their old toys. programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Pennys family are unhappy that shes decided to come out of her shell… literally. And Penny wants her family to come out of their shell...also literally. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.desc: Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises that Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. But as the mystery unravels, it seems the culprits may have turned on each other.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. Mom explains Yuki Masamis mother is an old school friend and repeatedly refuses to fight her despite further provocation. However when Yuki threatens to get Mom fired from her job Mom has no choice but to partake in a rematch of a karate match her and Yuki had fought as children.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. Clips include Banana Joes self-choreographed acrobatics, Richards latest culinary invention and Gumball and Darwins contest for who can pull the weirdest face.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Rob finally gains the power to destroy Gumballs entire world.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Dad has to make the kids on time for their first day back at school. But hes overslept and now he cant find Gumball, Darwin or Anais anywhere. He sets about retracing his steps from the day before, to work out where they might be. When he finally figures out where they are, its a race against time to rescue them and prove to himself - and Mum - that hes not a bad father.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a trip down memory lane when the Docs find an old childhood photo and reminisce about their first meeting so many years ago. It all started at Lab School, when Specs was a naive dork and Skinny was the school ruffian. A lot has changed since then, of course. Specs is now the tough guy, and Skinny is now the dork, and their early adventures set in motion a bunch of other consequences, too. Embittered, angry boss? Check. Moustachioed Chief of Police with an age-old grudge? Check. Also dont forget the lab experiment that went spectacularly wrong. That orange blob in the test tube: did that just move?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

Barkley reforms when he meets Polly and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Little Quacker finds that his favorite birdbath is cracked he enlists Jerrys help to get it fixed. They get sidetracked by the scent of Toms delicious chinese takeout. After a battle for the food Tom steals Little Quackers fortune cookie and gets the best fortune ever! Tom sets out into the world with his newfound luck only to be on the receiving end of miserable luck.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary, but Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent as Batman and Bam pursue her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against Riddler.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone. / Tom and Jerry cant sleep because of incessant barking. / When Spikes poker playing pals go missing he hires the cat and mouse detective to find out where theyve gone. / Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm for her feet. / Tom is getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / Tom and Jerry get into a garden growing contest that turns out badly for Tom. / Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles. / An overly ambitious young house sitter ruins Toms plans. / Hildies received another dozen roses from her admirer. / A travelling cat "salesman" sells Tom just what he needs. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles that goes off the tracks when mouse-obsessed Toodles catches a glimpse of Tuffy and Jerry. Despite Toms best efforts to get Toodles to focus on him, she wont. Making things worse, her accident prone ways leave Tom to choose between self-preservation and romance.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An overly ambitious young house-sitter ruins Toms plans to rule the roost while Rick and Ginger are away. Jerry relishes Toms predicament, that is until the house-sitter spots the mouse and he becomes enemy number one! With both Tom and Jerry in her sights, now the cat and mouse must work together to send the house-sitter packing!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie has received another dozen black roses along with all the other nasty gifts from the past few weeks. Curious, she enlists Tom and Jerry to find out who the admirer is. Tom starts searching the enchanted flower shop on the other side of the forest. There he finds a series of clues after following a dead end a number of times, he finds out who the admirer is. It turns out to be Newt who wanted to support Hildie.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After another unsuccessful attempt on Toms part to catch Jerry, a traveling cat salesman named Carver is happy to sell Tom just what he needs; a series of elaborate mousetraps, tricks and schemes. Tom makes numerous attempts to dish out a world of hurt to Jerry, but only succeeds in hurting himself.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its back to basics as Specs attempts to catch Lamput with a net. Not being much good at anything at all physical, Specs ends up whacking himself on his own noggin. The blow shakes loose what little ability Specs had to function as an adult. Hes transformed into a wailing infant who requires 24 hour care from his devoted... parents? Skinny and Lamput have to learn on the job. Taking care of a baby is hard. Especially if its a giant annoying one.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters while trying to catch Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is hiding in a school, and the only way for the Docs to get him is to anti-age zap themselves back into childhood. (obviously)After stalking him in the corridors and unsuccessfully evading detention slips from the Headteacher, they find themselves in class. Skinny is rather happy to be back, but Specs doesnt like tests or art or chemistry or anything that distracts him from his true objective. Each time they almost get him, Lamput is saved by the bell (and even becomes the bell), and its a race against home time to see if they can get Lamput before the Headteacher gets them.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! The public are gonna do your work for you. Weirdly quickly, a hard-boiled granny shows up with Lamput under her arm. Things turn ugly when she actually expects to be paid the reward. Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Like a big brother Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed makes them both breakfast gets Tuffy cleaned up puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol cat to the house next door where Winston waits greeting his students a gaggle of mice including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion and today theyre going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Toms house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouses down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, its an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom. / A Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year. / Butch spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! / Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler. Mr. Bean and Teddy have no plans and so decide to stay in bed all day - when Mr. Bean is determined to ensure that his feet cant touch the ground, he pushes the bed around with a broom instead. Mr. Bean has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth, and the even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler. After seeing a flashy electric go-kart Mr. Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr. Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs. Wickets garden - when Mr. Bean and Mr. Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills at the go-kart track, they take the karts for a "proper" race around the park. Meanwhile, Mrs. Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house...

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy head to the bowling alley with a free voucher, but Mr Bean finds it a lot harder than he expected. Seeing a little girl with a smaller ball, he borrows it, thinking it will be easier to use. But instead, he gets his fingers stuck in the ball and he causes havoc trying to pull them out.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler. Mr. Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall - they are right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Mr. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one, but he cant afford it - when he visits a food truck that has laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler. Mr. Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy when Mrs. Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase - "Nobody gets left behind" - Mr. Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs. Wickets flat, but none of them work until he hits on the perfect plan... or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around - yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal - revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park - first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before hes chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Theres Football Fever as the Docs and Lamput go to watch the game! In the second half of the game, they end up on the pitch! Lamput causes havoc for the Docs as he disguises himself as flags, jerseys, whistles and even the football, but as they get closer to the 90th minute, they realise that its a team effort to win, and the game needs everyone to be on the same side.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to "irreconcilable differences". For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesnt like change; its like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamputs perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously thats the real enemy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Specs tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: While on vacation, The Looney Builders befriend Coco the Crab and offer to build her a mini-resort. They shrink down for a micro-build and must rely on the islands natural resources to get the job done.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critters arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken. / Sharko misses the ocean. So when to boat crashes and sinks under the sea hes delighted! / Marina is fascinated by train models. Zig and Bernie turn up with a miniature train that actually works. Marina climbs aboard with Sharko, who bars Zig and Bernie from the trip. / Sharko cant emerge from a recurring pie-in-the-face dream. / How did Bernie end up on the sea floor in the first place? / Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. / The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. / Masha tries to comprehend the centuries-old wisdom and sets off in search of enlightenment in the magical land of India, where she will find many new experiences and discoveries. / Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! / To cure her beloved assistant, Masha goes to a mysterious and amazing eastern country. But the answers to the most difficult questions are simpler than they seem at first glance. / The little ducklings are learning the safe way to cross the street today! Join in and sing along! / Tom has a nightmare about a super-intelligent mouse takeover. Jerry inherits a hamster ball. A chase through NYC turns into a musical tribute.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: A music video of Lola Bunny using her bulldozer to move things as she oversees various looney builds.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinns Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. F 3/3

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. Its up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A British super spy hires Tom and Jerry to help guard the Queens precious objects.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Jerrys British cousins Oliver and Alistair come for a visit after forgetting their wives birthdays.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Tom is jealous that Jerry is having fun on his play date with destiny, so he tries to ruin it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Detectives try to escort a goofy Canadian goose back across the border between the USA and Canada before duck season begins.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. A lemur belonging to the Duchess adventurous cousin puts Toms job as an under-butler in jeopardy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Mike, Spikes big brother, visits him and quickly turns out to be as embarrassing as he is invasive - from then on, Spike, Tom, Jerry and Tuffy gang up to get rid of the inconvenience.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler. Seeing a little girl with a smaller ball, he borrows it, thinking it will be easier to use. But instead, he gets his fingers stuck in the ball and he causes havoc trying to pull them out.

Mr. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one, but he cant afford it - when he visits a food truck that has laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her, he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude. This demands practice, of course, but it especially demands lots of willpower and concentration to get rid of the rowdy Lemmings without losing ones temper.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: SuperThings
programme.desc: The villains have discovered the location of Enigmas base and the Kazoom Kids must protect it from an attack led by Mr. King.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogres tooth, they warn Tom and Jerry not to touch it. Naturally, they both try to get the other one to touch it, until they accidentally both touch it and discover it has greater powers than they ever could imagine. Now, neither of them want to let it go!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After accidentally locking Tom and Jerry in the garage, an exhausted Rick reports that hes finished organising the garage for the big yard sale in the morning. Better get to bed because theyve got to get up bright and early! When Spike realises Tykes first collar (the one he had as a wee-pup) was tossed in a box of pet items to be sold, he recruits Tom and Jerry to help him get it back. They successfully return the collar to Spike, but not before being locked in the garage for the night and doing battle using every yard sale toy, gadget and yard tool at their disposal to survive each other.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone. / Tom and Jerry cant sleep because of incessant barking. / When Spikes poker playing pals go missing he hires the cat and mouse detective to find out where theyve gone. / Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm for her feet. / Tom is getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding. programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles that goes off the tracks when mouse-obsessed Toodles catches a glimpse of Tuffy and Jerry. Despite Toms best efforts to get Toodles to focus on him, she wont. Making things worse, her accident prone ways leave Tom to choose between self-preservation and romance.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. Jerry and Napoleon sneak some cookies and they have fun terrorizing Tom an alley cat who has broken in to eat them. The tables are turned when Tom gets his hands on the cookies.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings dont miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to "gold leaf" the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that its his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Batwing is unable to save Batman from a sunken ship trap set by Penguin after refusing to practise with her new underwater mode.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Batwheels have to learn to drive a mile in each others wheels after agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo. / Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. F 3/3

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light. / Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep. F 3/3

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires the Looney Builders to build a water wheel in the forest where Porky worries about a creature called Big Feet.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

The Looney Builders build a closet for Tibs Squirrel in his tree, but it wont fit Tibs stuff in and he wont get rid of anything.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

When the Looney Builders enter a sandcastle building contest, Tweety sees the competition and loses confidence in his idea.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger is in charge of taking care of her mothers bird. Tom tries his hardest to keep from eating the bird but cant control himself. He gets kicked out by Ginger and feels guilty. Tom and Jerry work together to keep the bird safe from Butch.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry pretends to be a vampire to scare Tom. Tom balances trying to keep vampire Jerry at bay and helping the witches make a new potion. Now its up to Tom with the help of his friend Newt to defeat the vampire mouse before its too late!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars Spike steps up and trains Tom and Jerry to be his helpers. At first it seems like they are going to fumble their security jobs but then a burglar proves to be no match for our destructive trio.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his beloved cat Wilson. Tom is trying to break into the lab to eat Jerry and Napoleon and accidentally gets mistaken for a young Wilson and is taken home. Tom must convince Dr. Bigby hes got the wrong cat! Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real Wilson who is a mean vicious cat.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But its a metal so rare its only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Animated series for younger viewers. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. She prepares for the most interstellar Momella Day yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Animated series for younger viewers. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they cant hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad installs a new Mauss security system to protect Toad Hall from the weasels but Toads arrogance and rudeness towards Mauss leaves Toad locked out of Toad Hall for good. Only a big mouse sized apology can put things right.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it. The weasels trap Toad in the hammock, leaving Toad Hall wide open for them. Can Toads friends use the hammock to regain Toad Hall?

programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Missing Pears
programme.desc: Many of the riverbank folk have their eyes on Toads ripe pears. Ratty offers to guard the pear tree all night but in the morning, all the pears are gone thus mounting an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler. Mr. Bean has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth, and the even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

Meanwhile, Mrs. Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house...

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy head to the bowling alley with a free voucher, but Mr Bean finds it a lot harder than he expected. Seeing a little girl with a smaller ball, he borrows it, thinking it will be easier to use. But instead, he gets his fingers stuck in the ball and he causes havoc trying to pull them out.

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.desc: Toad boasts he can get to the seaside in his hot air ballon and be back in time for his grand dinner. He soon gets into trouble and crash lands in the Wild Woods. Trapped in the ropes and branches of trees, Toad is helpless to stop the weasels marching on Toad Hall.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. / While salmon fishing on the riverbank Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. / With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers. / The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. And to be sure they cannot force the lock, Grizzy throws all the house tools into the ravine. The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: SuperThings
programme.desc: A collision between Kid Kazoom and Kid Fury causes the Kazoom to break into 6 pieces. Their distrust of Kid Fury makes him decide to join Mr. King.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: While on vacation, The Looney Builders befriend Coco the Crab and offer to build her a mini-resort. They shrink down for a micro-build and must rely on the islands natural resources to get the job done.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the towns volunteer firefighters to build a fire truck.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Batwheels zoom into action when the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick has taken up painting to help him relax. Unfortunately, despite warnings to stay out of his studio, Tom and Jerry inadvertently destroy his very first painting. Now they must reproduce it before he returns home. They end up getting in a competition trying to prove whos the best artist! May the best Renoir win!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: De Zaak van het Vermiste Kussen
programme.desc: Unable to sleep because of the incessant barking from a dog somewhere in the city, Tom and Jerry must track down the noisy mutt. When they find the dog with the help of a friendly bat, they discover the pup cant sleep without her special pillow. Now, for the sake of everyones sleep, the great pillow case is on!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Rick and Ginger install a high-tech, state-of-the-art home security system, Tom and Jerrys shenanigans activate the homes automation system. Using the system against each other, they quickly lose control and the house shuts them down.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until hes feeling better. Butch is finally getting what hes wanted, much to Toms chagrin, especially now that Gingers having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerrys getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm thatll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in, nice and good. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear. Hildies recipe may be a foot balm bomb but it gives Tom a good idea. Hell use it to "vanish" into thin air. Jerry literally doesnt know what hit him when the invisible cat bats him around like a ball of yarn. Tom is unaware when the effects begin to wear off and Jerry is able to defend himself. When Jerry gets a hold of the cream, its his turn to have the upper hand. A battle of the vanishing cream ensues, each using it in various ways to outwit the other.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its Toms wedding day! Hes getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that were experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it cant possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. During the chase, Tom eats a melon which turns him into a sphere shape and Jerry eats a piece of cheese which turns him into a triangle shape.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked "ollies" with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself - a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. He buys-up all the stickers in the neighbourhood and has almost completed his task when Nephew points out that hes missing one: the famous sticker owned by local footballing celebrity Jamie Studds. Bean turns thief to be the best collector of em all.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After failing to catch Lamput again and again, the Docs notice that they lack something crucial in order to be successful in life, a good moustache! With their new found facial hair, the world now bends to their will!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them off-earth and they end up on the moon after hitching a ride on Boss rocket ship. Lamput accidentally discovers aliens on the moon who are seemingly planning to destroy Earth. He seeks out the Docs for help to prevent this terrible event.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature form. / Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side there is the same cabin only it doesnt belong to a ranger. / Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. Grizzy thinks its a silly game until he accidentally tries out the contraption for himself and becomes instantly addicted. What is the secret of this seemingly banal object that make the heads of its enthusiasts spin as well?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / A Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year. / Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom. / An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life. / Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves. / Butch spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom cant pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry whos trying to protect him!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn a giant stuffed warlock and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish Tom cant pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry whos trying to protect him!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first Tom has fun crafting his own fate but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat Butch is up to no good in the end Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Toms discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: Someones in the Kitchen with Mynah
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebodys got to go.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler. Mr. Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but its too expensive to buy. When Mr. Bean secretly tries to read it in the shop - until hes thrown out - someone else then buys the book to his dismay and so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr. Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddys picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines - and soon enough, hes been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like hes cheating!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet - but it wont appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but its useless - he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm - yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesnt miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope - great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride - but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He cant afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwals new drone that he doesnt notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwals car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thiefs warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation - but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwals flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints - pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but its too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy - the winner being the first to climb "The Big One", a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs and Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a festive course for the Fall foot race. Wile E. Coyote is determined to beat the Road Runner with his Robo-Runner despite its malfunctions.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their fast customer, Speedy Gonzalez. / Marina makes a documentary about the North Pole with Sharko. / Marina fantasizes about winter sports. Sharko transforms the volcano into a ski resort. Zig is delighted: this is an incredible opportunity! / Sharko and Marina want to perform as a figure skating duo. / Will Bernie stop at nothing to win the talent contest? / Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. / The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. / It is interesting to know how your favorite characters will behave if you find yourself in the wild West. Who will be a sheriff, who is a robber, and who is a fighter for justice? / On a nice summers day Bear, as usual, goes fishing and Masha follows alongside. But the fishing trip didnt quite work out. / When its winter and cold outside, hot drinks arent the only ones who can warm you up. Take a trip into hot memories of Mexico. Masha and the Bear arent afraid of cold weather. / Its summer! Lets go to the beach! Its time for some fun under the sun! / Tom is to keep a chimp away from bananas; Tom takes Spikes place in a dog contest; A musical frolic in the snow; Toots is determined to catch Jerry.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.sub-title: Dont Be Fooled By His Size
programme.desc: Tweety Bird uses his crane to lift stuff in this music video as he helps his crew get the job done.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. Its up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gothams Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer. / Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave. programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry must prevent the entire city blowing up.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
